name: COMPILED_ASSIGNMENT_DATA
description: This table holds the External System Identifier Bundles and roster identifiers for which compiled roster assignment data was loaded.

columns.name: ASGN_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the assignment data record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this assignment data record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CM_LOG_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance from which this record or line was extracted. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: ROSTER_IDENTIFIER_C_NAME
columns.description: The roster population that this line contains compiled tracking data for.

columns.name: ASSIGNMENT_PERIOD_EFF_DATE
columns.description: The start date of this compiled roster assignment period.

columns.name: ASSIGNMENT_PERIOD_TERM_DATE
columns.description: The end date of this compiled roster assignment period.
